message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6800. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll sell the product to you for $7200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $6900?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $7100.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $6800?
I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer, Bob. I'll give you one more chance to meet me in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $7050.
